participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, enjoys social activities.
participant_1.background: For vacation I enjoy time at the beach. My favorite band is up and I got to see them in concert once. I am an elementary school teacher. I love to play board games.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and resilient, has a strong sense of family.
participant_2.background: My father is in the army. I recently was fired and had to get a new job. I work in the insurance business. My mom passed away when I was young.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the beach, play board games, and watch movies.
Nice! I like to go to the beach too. What's your favorite beach?
I like beaches with white sand and clear water.
Me too! I've been to some beautiful beaches in the Caribbean.
I've never been to the Caribbean, but I'd love to go.
You should! It's absolutely gorgeous.
Maybe I will someday.
I'm sure you'd love it. What's your favorite board game?
I like Monopoly and Scrabble.
I love Monopoly! I'm not very good at Scrabble though.
I'm not very good at Monopoly, but I love it anyway.
Me too! It's so much fun to try to bankrupt your friends and family.
I know right? It's the best.
What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like all kinds of movies, but I especially like comedies and action movies.
Me too! I love to laugh and be entertained.
Me too! I love to watch movies that make me forget about my problems.
I know what you mean. Movies are a great way to relax and de-stress.
I agree. They're the best.
